BBEX3.A.RWF.USD.CA.AA.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Rwanda  / USD 1 = RWF ... (buying)
Source: Banque Nationale du Rwanda, Kigali
Methodology: Until 2004, calculated on the basis of month-end rates, from 2005 on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates.

Comment on 1990: On 12 November 1990, the Rwanda franc was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling).  9 November 1990: USD 1 = RWF 70.6043 / 72.0307  12 November 1990: USD 1 = RWF 117.5109 / 119.8849   Calculated devaluation: 39.9%.

Comment on 1992: On 10 June 1992, the Rwanda franc was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling).  9 June 1992: USD 1 = RWF 120.7553 / 123.1949  10 June 1992: USD 1 = RWF 141.7068 / 144.5696  Calculated devaluation: 14.8%.

Comment on 1995: On 6 March 1995, the Rwanda franc was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling).  3 March 1995: USD 1 = RWF 133.2411 / 135.9329  6 March 1995: USD 1 = RWF 230,2600 / 233,7400  Calculated devaluation: 42.0%.
